channel.title: Hi, I am Raj - founder of DataMyth. Automated Solution for Smart Marketing
channel.description:
Hi all,
With over 13 years of experience in the digital industry has driven me to build my first solution for marketers by translating my inclination for automating processes into a SaaS solution.
Recently launched DataMyth, a SaaS based reporting tool which provides automated reporting with analysis and insights for Google Analytics & Google ads in a minute. Digital marketers who wants to reduce time on their reports & focus on strategy & optimization, please have a look & provide your valuable feedback.
Raj
